layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (50,50) size 700x156
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (50,50) size 700x156 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (51,51) size 598x54 [color=#000080] [border: (1px solid #000080)]
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (1,17) size 596x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 344x19
          text run at (0,0) width 344: "There should be a yellow square in the top-left corner, "
        LayoutInline {EM} at (0,0) size 52x19
          LayoutText {#text} at (344,0) size 52x19
            text run at (344,0) width 52: "between"
        LayoutText {#text} at (396,0) size 78x19
          text run at (396,0) width 78: " the borders."
